# Test: backslash-newline continuation
# Backslash at end of line continues command

puts hel\
lo
puts "hel\
lo"

tests.name: braces-1.1
braces-1.2
comments-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: comments
# Hash at start of command begins a comment

# this is a comment
puts hello
# another comment
puts world
puts notacomment ;# inline comment

tests.name: quotes-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: double quote grouping
# Double quotes group words but allow substitution

puts "hello world"
puts "hello   world"
puts "line1
line2"
tests.stdout:
hello world
hello   world
line1
line2

tests.name: semicolon-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: semicolon command separator
# Semicolons separate commands on the same line

puts hello; puts world
puts a; puts b; puts c

tests.name: words-1.1
tests.script:
# Test: basic word splitting
# Words are separated by whitespace

puts hello
puts hello world
puts    hello    world
tests.stderr:
can not find channel named "hello"
    while executing
"puts hello world"
